review: He is detailed and gives time . Not in hurry.explains the issue and thus the therapy. Looks at finer details

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi, I am J R  Singh working in MTNL, Mumbai and staying at Mulund writing this review16 days after slip disc operation done by Dr. Vikas Jain. For the past 30 days I was not able to walk, couldn't attend my office and literally I was  bedridden. My calf and back of thigh of left leg was very painful. We have consulted many doctors but could not be relieved of pain. Once I happen to see good  reviews of Dr.Jain on Practo and we decided to consult him once .We met Dr Vikas Jain and in first appointment only he made me very comfortable. After his consultation and doing MRI we came to conclusion that we have to  do surgery and I was operated by Dr Vikas for slip disc. It was successful operation and  I was able to walk on the second day of surgery itself and now I am  able to walk and sit properly. Troughout all appointments, surgery and routine check-up, Dr Vikas was so humble, friendly, ready to help any time and for that I highly appreciate him and want to recommend him for any spine related problem like slip disc etc.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a great experience to meet Dr. Vikas and he dignosed the very complicated problem of scoliosis of my dad (age 63) and successfully done spine surgery which took around 12hrs to be completed.

My dad suffered alot by back pain as long as 10-12 year approx. no one we're ready to take this case and then I met Dr. Vikas through a friend. He dignosed the problem very patiently. we have done surgery in Sushrut hospital. 

It's been 1 year now, my dad is now able to walk and don't have any pain in back. even routine check-up went fine and not such issue is found.

throughout all appointments, surgery and routine check-up, he was so humble, friendly and taken extra care.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hello All,I have been writing this review after a month of treatment from Dr.JainMy father had slip disc issue on Sevier level and because of that he was bedridden and could not even stand or sit.... we have consulted many doctors and after reading the reviews of Dr.Jain we have decided to consult with him once .we have met doctor Jain and in first appointment only he made my father very comfortable.after his consultation and doing MRI we came to conclusion that we have to go through the surgery route.after so many questions (which he answered very patiently and many time) we have done with slip disc surgery. it was successful operation and my father was able to stand on the second day of surgery itself and now he is able to walk and sit properly.Dr.Jain is very friendly doctor and ready to help any time without any delay and I really appreciate for that.I would really recommend him for slip disc treatment anytime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ***** **** *** **** **** ********* ***** *** *********** He is very friendly. He is straightforward, kind and very soft spoken. The spinal operation which Dr Vikas Jain performed on my mother was very very complicated but he performed it very well. My mother is in good health now. Dr Vikas Jains personal follow up with his patients is very good for example he called personally on my mobile number to inform me that he is out of country for one week and gave me the necessary instructions to follow up in his absence. He also asked me to call him or send a WhatsApp message if his mobile is not reachable. It very rare to see this kind of person attention given to a patient. I really appreciate Dr Vikas Jains kindness and his sincerity towards his profession.

I would request ever one to pls once try Dr Vikas Jains treatment. He is very good doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was bit too busy with others , he doesntcare to either explain or examine things in details.We have been extremely unsatisfied with our visit to him.The plaster he did on the thumb barely stayed impact to the thumb properly for few days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited doctor for severe pain in my legs because of nerves. He told me for MRI and after seeing MRI, he suggested surgery and operated with microscopic surgery, I was immediately relieved of pain and started walking same day. I am very comfortable now and pain free. Very nice doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Vikas is one of those medical professionals who believe in diagnosis in proportion to the issue at hand. I had a minor case of disk herniation. Dr Jain carried out the examination for a good 15-20 minutes. After being sure about the scale of the issue ,he patiently explained it to me in detail. Further he did not recommended any unnecessary tests as well. I would highly recommend Dr. Vikas Jain to anyone with the problems which fall under his area of practice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a slip disc problem sine last 1 month for which i consulted dr jain. He explained me the intensity of my problem and the required protocol and line of treatment. 
After being advised surgery by 2 different docs,  dr jain treated me with his meds and advices.
